description: Warm up with this hearty lentil and spinach stew that's ready in less than 30 minutes. This one-pan recipe is the perfect weeknight dinner.
keywords: Vegetable stew,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Winter,Weeknight dinner,Aug 2021,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Quick Lentil & Spinach Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch coriander, leaves picked, finely chopped
2 wholemeal Lebanese bread rounds, halved (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook bolognese mix, stirring, for 5 minutes or until vegetables start to soften. Add curry powder, garlic and half the chilli, then cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Add stock, tomatoes and lentils, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Stir in spinach and lemon juice, then cook for 1 minute or until spinach has wilted. Season. Sprinkle with coriander and remaining chilli, then serve with bread.
